author: davidlt
body: Basically `throw` dynamic exception specifier was deprecated in C++11 and removed in C++17. Also some things like `boost::shared_ptr` and `boost::tuples::tie` + `boost::tuple` are now available under C++ standard library thus we should avoid external dependency -- _boost_. There is now alternative for `boost::format`, but that could still be rewritten.
title: Cleanup throw specifier and boost stuff
